cafe_quiet.speaker: Narrator
cafe_quiet.text: The cafe is quiet in the late evening. You sit at your favorite table, your dragon dozing beside you, Mother across from you with two cups of tea.

mother_asks.speaker: Mother
mother_asks.text: When I sent you here, I wasn't sure what would happen. I only knew that you needed to find your own way. Tell me... has it been worth it?

player_reflects.speaker: Narrator
player_reflects.text: You think of all that's happened. The struggles. The triumphs. The friends you've made along the way.

choices.text: Every moment has been a gift.
It wasn't easy, but I wouldn't change any of it.

mother_pleased.speaker: Mother
mother_pleased.text: *She smiles warmly* That's what I hoped you'd say. You've faced challenges that would have broken others, and you've grown stronger for it.

mother_proud.speaker: Mother
mother_proud.text: *Pride shines in her eyes* Strength isn't about avoiding hardship. It's about walking through it and coming out the other side. You've done that beautifully.

remember_marcus.speaker: Mother
remember_marcus.text: Tell me about the people you've met. Marcus, the wanderer... what did he teach you?

marcus_lesson.speaker: Narrator
marcus_lesson.text: You remember Marcus - his stories, his wisdom, his kindness to strangers. He taught you that adventure doesn't always mean traveling far.

lily_lesson.speaker: Narrator
lily_lesson.text: Lily showed you that excellence and kindness aren't opposites. That passion for craft is beautiful, but connection with others is what makes it meaningful.

garrett_prompt.speaker: Mother
garrett_prompt.text: Old Man Garrett... such a gentle soul carrying such heavy grief.

garrett_lesson.speaker: Narrator
garrett_lesson.text: From Garrett, you learned that letting go doesn't mean forgetting. That honoring the past and embracing the future can coexist.

all_friends.speaker: Mother
all_friends.text: Captain Vera, the Noble, the siblings Elena and Thomas... each of them found something here. Found healing. Found hope.

mother_truth.speaker: Mother
mother_truth.text: That's the true legacy of Dragon Haven Cafe, my child. Not just the dragon bond, but this - creating a place where broken people can become whole again.

end_scene.speaker: Narrator
end_scene.text: Your dragon stirs in its sleep, a contented rumble escaping. This place, these people, this life - it's exactly where you're meant to be.
